Description: FRagment of oval handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora, moderate turn. Clay medium pale pink. Rectangular stamp at top of outer face of handle.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Sir Charles Thomas Newton (?)
Curator's comments: Probably drawn by Petrie (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 181, 34. Name Simos.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Charles Thomas Newton (possibly)
